text: Costea is a Romanian given name for males. It is also a quite common Romanian surname. It is a variant of the name Constantin. ==Notable bearers== * Costea of Moldavia * Costea, the alleged great-grandfather of John Hunyadi ==As surname== * Florin Costea * Mihai Costea * Doru Romulus Costea * Sergiu Costea Category:Romanian masculine given names Category:Romanian-language surnames
title: Costea
